title: The Urban Guardian: The Tale of Alice Lewis
summary: Alice Lewis discovers her ability to manipulate time during a week filled with unexpected challenges, using her powers to avert disasters and help her community.
summaryGerman: Alice Lewis entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, die Zeit zu manipulieren, während einer Woche voller unerwarteter Herausforderungen und nutzt ihre Kräfte, um Katastrophen zu vermeiden und ihrer Gemeinschaft zu helfen.
summaryDutch: Alice Lewis ontdekt haar vermogen om tijd te manipuleren gedurende een week vol onverwachte uitdagingen, en gebruikt haar krachten om rampen te voorkomen en haar gemeenschap te helpen.
summaryFrench: Alice Lewis découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps au cours d'une semaine remplie de défis inattendus, utilisant ses pouvoirs pour éviter des catastrophes et aider sa communauté.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.

story.text: Alice Lewis, an energetic 21-year-old with a passion for selling and managing, encounters a peculiar old clock in her antique shop that mysteriously stops time whenever she touches it.
Experimenting with her newfound power, Alice stops time to avert a major accident downtown, saving dozens of lives and feeling triumphant about her secret ability.
Trying to balance her normal life and heroics, Alice feels overwhelmed and sad as she struggles to keep her powers a secret from her friends and family.
Alice uses her time-stopping ability to solve complex problems at her shop, boosting her business and feeling energetic as she perfects her power.
A romantic interest in her life begins to suspect Alice’s strange disappearances and late arrivals. Alice spends the day feeling romantically intrigued yet worried.
Alice decides to confide in her romantic partner about her powers, and they spend a peaceful day together understanding and planning the possibilities of her abilities.
Alice takes a stand against a city-wide threat by meticulously planning and executing a time-stop that saves the city, her actions dubbed 'epic' by the news.

ending: As the week closes, Alice Lewis learns the depths of her power and the importance of trust, stepping into her role as a true urban guardian.
